about_the_game:
Fastival is an arcade racing game where players speed through different attractions within a vibrant and cartoony carnival throughout each race. Knock down targets as you race to trigger unique effects on the track that you can use to your advantage. Collect wacky items that can be used to mess with other racers to enhance your driving capabilities.

Race Through Three Unique Tracks

Each track is a different section of the Fastival with its own fun theme. Enter the Fastival in “Whirling Welcome,” navigating tight turns and spiraling around a merry go round. Navigate a field of giant wack-a-moles popping up and down and zoom across a roller coaster. Fly through a ring of fire and get launched by a cannon up into the big top circus tent.

Master Each Bumper Car

Fastival features four different types of bumper cars that players can choose from each with unique driving strengths and weaknesses. The Shark car boasts a higher top speed but is more challenging to control while the Vintage car is slower to accelerate but heavier, allowing you to utilize drifting to your advantage more often.

Knock Down Targets to Affect the Race

In Fastival, you can gain an advantage as you race through unique interactions with the environment. Knock down targets in each race by driving through them to trigger a temporary effect on the race track. Some targets will reveal a shorter path while others activate hazards that other racers have to steer clear of.

Use Items to Take Out the Competition

As you race, collect carnival tickets that turn into one of five fun items. Activate a firecracker to launch yourself forward and gain temporary invincibility, or throw a volley of water balloons at other racers to spin out their vehicles.

Customize Your Racer

Mix and match between four cute costumes and color palettes.

Developer Notes

Fastival was created by the students of Cohort 33 at SMU Guildhall, a graduate video game design program in Dallas, Texas. In their second Team Game Project course ("TGP2"), the entire cohort of 47 students from all disciplines—Art Creation, Programming, Design, and Production—with help from three game music students in SMU's Meadows School of the Arts came together each day to make this game. For many students, this is their first experience working on a large team, and the course is designed to teach the students how to communicate at scale and iterate on the game design to find the fun. To accomplish this in roughly 12 weeks of production and produce such a vibrant, fun game is a challenge, and we are really proud to share their hard work with you.

Thank you for playing. We hope you enjoy Fastival. If you do, please consider leaving a kind note in the community hub and share the game with your friends.

name: Fastival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600K, AMD 1600X or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Single player: NVIDIA GTX 1050; AMD Radeon 7950, or better; Multiplayer: NVIDIA GTX 1080, AMD RX 5700XT or better (with "Low" graphics settings)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: On "Low" graphics settings, the game is playable in single-player mode with older hardware including recent integrated graphics CPUs. However, to take advantage of muiltiplayer or higher graphics settings, a GPU is required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel 10th Gen, AMD Zen3, or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX-class, AMD 6700-class or better for "High" graphics settings
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Built in Unreal Engine 5, the game can be a graphically intense game at higher resolutions and quality settings. "High" and especially "Epic" graphics settings in 4k or Ultrawide resolutions with multiplayer will challenge all but the most recent GPUs. However, adjusting the quality settings and resolutions in the game really do improve performance.

short_description: Race through an enchanting carnival and be on the lookout for wacky obstacles and cool shortcuts as you compete against up to three other friends in this cute and cartoony arcade racing game!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
